title: over 1,5 h login
body: I just want to login but waiting 1,5 h is one thing, the over is: The time i have to wait is getting more and more on EUWest....

replies.body: Same here, but they are aware of the problem: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#euw
ye seems to be fixed - i'm in now :P
Huzzah! Glad you were able to finally get back on the Rift ^_^!
